entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Partly cloudy overnight with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
